title: How to team
body: Anyone pls halp we need you. Yes we need you, the one reading this you are the one that can save them all. you can become the Pokémon master and save the Digi world! You are the only one that can stop the Fire Nation. We need your help!!!

replies.body:
ID: Raito
prefer mid or top
GOLD 5 lokking for a team for any team rank
